definition: capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word

sentences.english: You must use a gas having about 80 % of the higher range full scale value.
sentences.chinese: 你必须使用一路气，满足满量程值80%的位置。

sentences.english: There are quantums scheduled after an incomplete quantum.
sentences.chinese: 某些量程被调度在未完成的量程之后。

sentences.english: There are quantums scheduled after an incomplete quantum.
sentences.chinese: 某些量程被调度在未完成的量程之后。

sentences.english: Full-Scale Structural Testing of Wind Turbine Blades TS Ed.
sentences.chinese: 风力发电机组叶片满量程试验。

sentences.english: It is complicated to perform multi-range measuring with usual data acquisition and recording devices.
sentences.chinese: 通常的数据采集与记录装置不易实现多量程测量。

sentences.english: To summarize, we must specify a low and a high value to define the range of an instrument .
sentences.chinese: 总结一下，我们必须定义仪表量程的最大值和最小值。

sentences.english: Select the lowest range of the voltmeter.
sentences.chinese: 选择伏特计的最低量程。

sentences.english: A kind of circuit for automatic range selection of voltmeters is introduced and designed.
sentences.chinese: 提出并设计了一种适用于电压表的量程自动转换电路。

sentences.english: Number of quantums skipped for subscription rule firings.
sentences.chinese: 针对订阅规则触发跳过的量程数。

sentences.english: Potting is a key step for the packaging of high-g micro-electro-mechanical system(MEMS) accelerometer.
sentences.chinese: 灌封是高量程微机械加速度计实用化的一个关键步骤。

sentences.english: No QTLs were detected for plasticity of LRL.
sentences.chinese: 没有个QTL检测的量程下限可塑性。

sentences.english: Measure value over range, change measure range.
sentences.chinese: 测量值超程，更改量程范畴。

sentences.english: It is generally determined by the range.
sentences.chinese: 测试电流通常由量程决定。

sentences.english: Standard manufacturer over range protection shall be specified.
sentences.chinese: 应注明标准的制造商超量程保护。

sentences.english: The range is usually limited to the full-scale deflection of the indicator .
sentences.chinese: 量程通常以指针的全分度偏转为限。

sentences.english: This paper introduces a new type of wide-range vacuum gauge.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了新型宽量程真空计的研制。

definition: rating (for power output, flame resistance etc)
